Articles.Content:
hello,

I deleted a mod because I thought that it was causing trouble but when I started the game my SPACE STATION (which I worked on for 3 months) wasn't loaded because it had a part that was part of the mod I deleted. Is there any way to get it back? 

Thank you in advance,

Jamie

In your save's folder, there's a folder called "backup".  In there should be 5 backup files with the date and time built into the file name.  Move one of those into the save's folder and load it like you would any other save.  After re-installing the mod, of course.

Also, the newest version makes that check before the save file is loaded.  Just FYI.

Edited November 16, 2018 by Geonovast
thank you so much, I got my station back!
